resources.string: restart the app to increase the counter. See? It\'s persistent
generate data in the SharedPreferences and import them to the tray preference
increases a counter on the main process. Reading it in another process. See the difference between SharedPreferences and Tray\nSee logcat for output!
listen to changes from other process
Click this button fast and you\'ll see the shared preferences having trouble staying in sync. No problem for tray
Only tray is possible to listen to changes made in a different process. The SharedPreferences receive no callback
